name: Invite registered user without organization to organization with default project via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project with `default` option.
- Signup `second user`.

### Verify that:

- User can invite to organization another user that is registered but **doesn't have organization**.
- Newly invited user is member of the `default` project.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project with default option.
  • Signup second user.

Verify that:

  • User can invite to organization another user that is registered but doesn't have organization.
  • Newly invited user is member of the default project.

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project with `default` option.
- Signup `second user`.

### Verify that:

- User can invite to organization another user that is registered but **doesn't have organization**.
- Newly invited user is member of the `default` project.
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project with default option.
  • Signup second user.

Verify that:

  • User can invite to organization another user that is registered but doesn't have organization.
  • Newly invited user is member of the default project.
